include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR})

#============================================================================
# zlib
#============================================================================

set(ZLIB_PUBLIC_HDRS
    zconf.h
    zlib.h
)
set(ZLIB_PRIVATE_HDRS
    crc32.h
    deflate.h
    gzguts.h
    inffast.h
    inffixed.h
    inflate.h
    inftrees.h
    trees.h
    zutil.h
)
set(ZLIB_SRCS
    adler32.c
    compress.c
    crc32.c
    deflate.c
    gzclose.c
    gzlib.c
    gzread.c
    gzwrite.c
    inflate.c
    infback.c
    inftrees.c
    inffast.c
    trees.c
    uncompr.c
    zutil.c
)

add_library(z ${ZLIB_SRCS} ${ZLIB_PUBLIC_HDRS} ${ZLIB_PRIVATE_HDRS})
set_target_properties(z PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
